original_text:
Yet you have made him a little lower than the heavenly beings
    and crowned him with glory and honor.
korean_text: 그를 하나님보다 조금 못하게 하시고 영화와 존귀로 관을 씌우셨나이다

sentences.original_text: Yet you have made him a little lower than the heavenly beings
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신은 그를 천사들보다 조금 낮게 만드셨습니다

sentences.original_text: and crowned him with glory and honor.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 영광과 존귀로 그에게 관을 씌우셨습니다
